description: This table contains data for the most recent claim external values (CEV) records for each CEV context.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim info record

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: MOST_RECENT_CEV_ID
columns.description: The most recent CEV ID for the given CEV context.

columns.name: CEV_CONTEXT_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column contains the Claim External Values (CEV) context (direction of claim file, incoming or outgoing)


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Incoming - Initial


Outgoing


Incoming - Repriced


Incoming - Canceled


Outgoing - External Pricing


Incoming - External Pricing


Incoming - Rejected

columns.name: CEV_UPDATE_DTTM
columns.description: This column contains the update instant (local time zone) for the most recent Claim External Values (CEV) for the given CEV context.

columns.name: CEV_UPDATE_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Update instant for the most recent CEV for the given CEV context.
